content.body: are setTimeout/setInterval somehow exposed to ShadowRealms?
oh, nm, AbortSignal's timeout isn't anyhow
smaug: I guess we don't want to require an event loop there?
content.formatted_body: smaug: I guess we don't want to require an event loop there?

content.body: my understanding was that `setTimeout`/`setInterval` were intended to be exposed, but that would need defining a `ShadowRealmGlobalScope` which hasn't happened yet
content.formatted_body: my understanding was that setTimeout/setInterval were intended to be exposed, but that would need defining a ShadowRealmGlobalScope which hasn't happened yet

content.body: Andreu Botella: interesting, but wouldn't that make it less shadowy as it would expose the ambient event loop? I guess that kinda happens anyway

content.body: I wonder what will not be exposed in shadow realms
